control.visible: Control.IsVisible(51) + [Container.Content(movies) + SubString(skin.string(widemovies.art),poster) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(sets)] | [Control.IsVisible(55) | Control.IsVisible(56) | Control.IsVisible(57) | Control.IsVisible(58) | Control.IsVisible(59) | Control.IsVisible(61) | Control.IsVisible(62) | Control.IsVisible(65)] + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(sets)]

Control.IsVisible(51) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartwidevideo) | Control.IsVisible(54) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartpostervideo) | Control.IsVisible(55) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartlowlistvideo) | Control.IsVisible(57) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartglasslistvideo) | Control.IsVisible(59) + !Skin.HasSetting(noartrightlistvideo) | Control.IsVisible(60) | Control.IsVisible(62) + Skin.HasSetting(noviewpanelposter) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows)]

control.label: $VAR[value_addon1_custom]

XBMC.RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], poster, fanart, extrafanart, extrathumbs, clearlogo, clearart, discart)
